item.title: Web Application Security Principles Revisited
item.description: Final Year Project - Web Application Security Principles About 18 years ago I worked on the final year project for my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science. I had just gotten interested in security and was learning about security principles. The title of the project was “Web Application Security Principles - Designing Secure Web Based Enterprise Solutions”. Looking back, a really cool thing was that I had just started working at Microsoft as an Associate Development Consultant and was bold enough to send the paper last minute over to Michael Howard - who responded and indeed reviewed it!
